comment.author: 52014195@N08
comment._content: Nice photo, I didn't know we (the USA) had any aircraft based out of Bermuda. I assume during WWII?

comment.author: 34508649@N04
comment._content: The UK name for the aircraft was the "Brewster Bermuda".  US forces had bases in Bermuda during WW II and these were heavily utilized during the Battle of the Atlantic.

comment.author: 52014195@N08
comment._content: Ah, I didn't know they had a UK name, didn't even think of that when the photo is of an American marked airfcraft. Thanks for the info.

comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: As a US Navy aircraft is depicted in the photo, it would be more accurate to use the "Buccaneer" name for this caption.
